title: Dell security advisory (AV25-865)
description: Between December 22 and 28, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Dell Storage Resource Manager (SRM)  version prior to 6.0.0.1
Dell Storage Monitoring and Reporting (SMR)  version prior to 6.0.0.1
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
